alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 10:25PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Indian River and northeastern St. Lucie Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1023 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms approaching Fellsmere, Sebastian, Vero Beach and Fort Pierce from the west. Movement was eastward at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Pierce, Sebastian, Vero Beach, Fellsmere and Indian River Shores. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland St. Lucie
